item.description:
Saturday, Jan 12, 10:00 am to 12:00 pm, Wethersfield. Meet Jim Woodworth at 412 Hartford Ave, corner of Jordan La, for a short walk through our new gate to our Wolf parcel and DeMille easement. See habitat improvements made with the help of a WHIP grant and volunteer work.  Stay for a longer walk up Hartford Ave. and out along the Hartford dike that divides the Folly Brook Nature area from the South Meadows Industrial Park.

Dress for the Weather and ground conditions. Many places will be muddy. Weather and water conditions may revise or cancel. This area is used for hunting, so wear an orange vest if you have one. Call the CT Audubon Society for the latest information, 860-633-8402. Free.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Walk Wolf parcel
